Title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
FullTitle: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood (1988)
SortTitle: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
Plot: Jason Voorhees is accidentally freed from his watery prison by a telekinetic teenager. Now, only she can stop him.
Tagline: Jason is back, but this time someone's waiting!
Writers: Daryl Haney, Manuel Fidello, Sean S. Cunningham
Stars: Terry Kiser, Jennifer Banko, John Otrin
